revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3Com |model=3CRWE80096A |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B002UQZGMY |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/13/2002 |manuf_country=Mexico |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=DF6-SRWL-306 |ic_id=2299104114A |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.4 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Intersil |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0E:6A |oui_eth=00:0E:6A }} ''11 Mbps Wireless LAN Access Point 8000''
The device has an alternate model of WL-306.
It appears to be using the '''NWN''' Poldhu (w/ '''Intersil''' rebranding).
Per '''3Com''''s datasheet, there were three order numbers (w/ different targeted regions) for the device.. *3CRWE80096A **U.S./Canada, Latin America, Europe, Asia Pacific countries *3CRWE80096A-FR **France *3CRWE80096A-JP **Japan
The device does not appear to have a Web configuration UI.
{{WiFiCert|W000361|04/24/2002}}
